document.title: On Bergson’s Concept of the Virtual
document.abstract: The purpose of this essay has been to come to a better understanding of Bergson’s concept of the virtual, particularly as it is developed and understood by Deleuze, to argue that a precedent exists for the virtual as a valid analytic category, and to suggest a possible avenue of further research.
document.publication-title: Gamut: Online Journal of the Music Theory Society of the Mid-Atlantic

field.name: short_title
field.value: On Bergson’s Concept of the Virtual
